title: 235 - The Creative Voice Secret, Find Your Value, Instagram Success Despite the Algorithm & MORE!
description:
Today is an Ask Dr. Pizza episode! These episodes have become most downloaded fan favorites. Why? Because no matter what kind of a creative business you have, there's sure to be a few nuggets in this episode that gets you exactly what you need to hear, exactly when you need to hear it!

Questions we tackle today:
1 - How do I get the money I deserve for my work?
2 - How do a network when I'm shy and just starting out?
3 - Marketing on Instagram - What do you do about the Instagram Algorithm?
4 - How do I do what to focus on?

AND MUCH MORE!!

SHOW NOTES
BREAKING THE TIME BARRIER - FRESHBOOKS
https://www.freshbooks.com/fbstaticprod-uploads/public-website-assets/other/Breaking-the-Time-Barrier.pdf

Brene Brown WTF Podcast
http://www.wtfpod.com/podcast/episode-1012-bren-brown

LATER's TIPS FOR BEATING THE INSTAGRAM ALGORITHM
https://later.com/blog/how-instagram-algorithm-works/

Good One Podcast Lonely Island
https://headgum.com/good-one-a-podcast-about-jokes/the-lonely-islands-jose-and-mark

Good One Podcast Gary Gulman
https://headgum.com/good-one-a-podcast-about-jokes/gary-gulmans-trader-joes

Mikey Burton Conceptual Illustration Class
https://www.skillshare.com/classes/Editorial-Illustration-Draw-Idioms-the-Designy-Way/1498727870/projects

CREDITS

Support Creative Pep Talk on Patreon: www.patreon.com/creativepeptalk

Thanks to Yoni Wolf and the band WHY? for our theme music.

Thanks to Alex Sugg for our soundtrack!
www.alexsugg.com

Dr. Pizza Theme by Ben Worley
http://benworley.work/

SPONSORS

WIX
This week’s episode is brought to you by Wix.com 
With Wix, the web your playground. Start with a blank page and design your website in any layout you want.
HTTP://WIX.COM/CREATIVEPEP

Skillshare
Skillshare is an online learning community for creators. With more than 25,000 classes in design, business, and more, you’ll discover countless ways to fuel your curiosity, creativity, and career. Take classes in social media marketing, mobile photography, creative writing, or even illustration! Whether you’re looking to discover a new passion, start a side hustle, or gain new professional skills, Skillshare is there to keep you learning, thriving, and reaching those new goals.
TWO FREE MONTHS OF SKILLSHARE: http://Skillshare.com/creativepep
author: andy@andy-j-miller.com (Andy J. Miller)
